service

Interface DispatcherService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DispatcherServiceImpl

    public interface DispatcherService

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean callConfirm(Order order, int bonus)
      Client makes an order, calculates order price considering the bonuses client wants to spend.
      boolean changeOrderStatus(java.lang.String orderAction, int orderId)
      Changes a order status according the input parameter.
      boolean deleteObsoleteOrders()
      Delegates deleting the orders to DAO layer.

    • Method Detail

      • callConfirm

        boolean callConfirm(Order order,
                    int bonus)
        Client makes an order, calculates order price considering the bonuses client wants to spend. Delegates order writing and delegates bonus decrease (if client wants to spend it) to the DAO layer
        Parameters:
        order - that client want to order.
        bonus - client want to spend.
        Returns:
        false if client has less bonuses then he are going to spent, true if it success.

      • getClientOrders

        java.util.List<Order> getClientOrders(Client client)
        Delegates selecting the client's orders to DAO layer and form their to list. If order has "archive" status remove it from list.
        Parameters:
        client - whose orders we want to select.
        Returns:
        client's order list.

      • getTaxiOrders

        java.util.List<Order> getTaxiOrders(Taxi taxi)
        Delegates selecting the taxi's orders to DAO layer and form their to list. Remove order from list if it has "archive" status .
        Parameters:
        taxi - whose orders we wants to select.
        Returns:
        client's order list.

      • getAllOrderList

        java.util.List<Order> getAllOrderList()
        Delegates selecting all the orders to DAO layer and form their to list.
        Returns:
        all order list.

      • changeOrderStatus

        boolean changeOrderStatus(java.lang.String orderAction,
                          int orderId)
        Changes a order status according the input parameter. Delegates updating orders to DAO layer.
        Parameters:
        orderAction - we are want to apply.
        orderId - order we want to update.
        Returns:
        true is changed successfully, otherwise false.

      • deleteObsoleteOrders

        boolean deleteObsoleteOrders()
        Delegates deleting the orders to DAO layer.
        Returns:
        true if deleting success, otherwise false.
